text: 10.8: FG 20.33Nde ŋgɨp maaŋ mbe suaŋv, nde vhɨra mba rɨɨi gumgi gu mbigi, nde mben kurkurarim, mbe rɨmrɨɨ vhɨzɨri. Nde vhɨra vhɨzi gumgi, nde taagi mbe khavɨri. Nde vhɨra ŋkari gu fari goreri rɨmrɨɨ ki gumgi, nde mbe kurkurari mbe rɨmrɨɨ vhɨra vhɨzɨri. Nde vhɨra ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi vhen ndav ki gumgi, nde mbe tɨn nta vharvhararim, nta mbe thamthav kɨrar hɨri. Nde kha ndigi bigɨn, nde fhura ana ndigi, ana vhez ki bigɨn fhuvara. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde fhura ana harigi gumgi gu mbigir nɨɨŋri. Nde ana mben nɨɨŋv vheza suaŋv mben kamɨ thari.
